E_MISSING_CLIENT_ENTRY_FILE.message: The Radonis client entry file does not exist at "{{ path }}"

E_MISSING_COMPONENTS_DIRECTORY.message: The Radonis components directory does not exist at "{{ path }}"

E_CANNOT_NEST_HYDRATION_ROOT.message: Found `HydrationRoot` "{{ hydrationRootIdentifier }}" for component "{{ componentIdentifier }}" nested inside `HydrationRoot` "{{ parentHydrationRootIdentifier }}" for component "{{ parentComponentIdentifier }}"
help: This is not allowed, as each `HydrationRoot` acts as root for a React app when hydrated on the client
